P006611.project_name: Santiago Water Supply and Sewerage Project

project_abstract.cdata: The Second Santiago Water Supply and Sewerage Project will be for: (i) Sewerage: construction of about 70 km of trunk mains and 200 km of collection sewers, a pilot sewage treatment plant and 13 waste water stabilization ponds; (ii) Water supply: construction of about 150 km of trunk and distribution mains, about 80,000 cubic meters of reservoir storage and about 30 wells; and (iii) General operations: technical assistance, construction of operations building for the Santiago Sanitary Works Company (EMOS), operating equipment, office equipment and water meters. In Valparaiso, the project will be for: (i) Water supply: construction of a 5,000 cubic meters reservoir and a 500 l/sec surface water treatment plant, and connection of about 1,500 houses and rehabilitation of a 750 l/sec surface water treatment plant; and (ii) Operations and studies: general technical assistance, project preparation studies and operations equipment. The project in Santiago would be for: (i) Sewerage: construction of about 70 km of trunk mains and 200 km of collection sewers, a pilot sewage treatment plant and 13 waste water stabilization ponds; (ii) Water supply: construction of about 150 km of trunk and distribution mains, about 80,000 cubic meters of reservoir storage and about 30 wells; and (iii) General operations: technical assistance, construction of operations building for the Santiago Sanitary Works Company (EMOS), operating equipment, office equipment and water meters. In Valparaiso, the project would be for: (i) Water supply: construction of a 5,000 cubic meters reservoir and a 500 l/sec surface water treatment plant, and connection of about 1,500 houses and rehabilitation of a 750 l/sec surface water treatment plant; and (ii) Operations and studies: general technical assistance, project preparation studies and operations equipment.
